001package gust.backend.model;
002
003
004import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
005import javax.annotation.Nullable;
006
007
008/** Describes a generic operational failure that occurred within the persistence engine. */
009@SuppressWarnings("WeakerAccess")
010public final class PersistenceOperationFailed extends PersistenceException {
011  /** Enumerated failure case. */
012  private final @Nonnull PersistenceFailure failure;
013
014  /**
015   * Main private constructor.
016   *
017   * @param message Error message to apply.
018   * @param cause Optional cause.
019   */
020  private PersistenceOperationFailed(@Nonnull PersistenceFailure failure,
021                                     @Nonnull String message,
022                                     @Nullable Throwable cause) {
023    super(message, cause);
024    this.failure = failure;
025  }
026
027  /**
028   * Generate a persistence failure exception for a generic (known) failure case.
029   *
030   * @param failure Known failure case to spawn an exception for.
031   * @return Exception object.
032   */
033  static @Nonnull PersistenceOperationFailed forErr(@Nonnull PersistenceFailure failure) {
034    return new PersistenceOperationFailed(failure, failure.getMessage(), null);
035  }
036
037  /**
038   * Generate a persistence failure exception for a generic (known) failure case, optionally applying an inner cause
039   * exception to the built object.
040   *
041   * @param failure Known failure case to spawn an exception for.
042   * @param cause Exception object to use as the inner cause.
043   * @return Spawned persistence exception object.
044   */
045  static @Nonnull PersistenceOperationFailed forErr(@Nonnull PersistenceFailure failure,
046                                                    @Nullable Throwable cause) {
047    return new PersistenceOperationFailed(failure, failure.getMessage(), cause);
048  }
049
050  // -- Getters -- //
051
052  /** @return Failure case that occurred. */
053  public @Nonnull PersistenceFailure getFailure() {
054    return failure;
055  }
056}
